parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mods and Addons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of addons ([[CfgPatches]]) in which the given config class is defined.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''configSourceAddonList''' config

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> config: [[Config]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[String]]s
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_addons = [[configSourceAddonList]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "Man");
[[hint]] [[str]] _addons; // ["A3_Data_F","A3_Characters_F","A3_Data_F_Curator","A3_Air_F_Heli"]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[configFile]], [[configSourceMod]], [[configSourceModList]]
</value></part></template></root>
